title: The Hulk Pc Game 2003
description:
Release Date: 5/28/2003 : 
Game Type: Action 
Image Format: BIN/CUE 
CDS: 3 
Default Language:
EN-USA

Game information : 

One year after the events that take place in the film; troubled
scientist 
Bruce Banner and his enraged alter ego, the Hulk, are forced into battle 
against the terrifying
forces of the Leader, who's intent on using the Hulk's 
gamma energy to unleash a relentless army of gamma
creatures on the world. 

Two types of gameplay - use the powers of stealth and logic as Bruce Banner or 
command the incredible strength and fury of the Hulk 


30 massive, highly-detailed levels featuring
environments both directly from 
the film and exclusive to the game 


Fully destructible and
interactive environments - virtually anything can be 
manipulated, picked up, destroyed or used a weapon. 


Intense boss battles - battle it out against gamma-enhanced super villains 
like Flux, Rampage and Half
Life 


Hollywood quality VO and soundtrack featuring detailed voice over from Eric 
Bana as Bruce
Banner 


Take down the Hulk's foes with over 25 devastating attacks, including super 
attacks like
the Sonic Clap and Gamma Slam 


Installation Information :

En-Us

1) Mount CD1
image. Run setup.exe and select 1. Minimum Install OR 2. Full Install (includes cutscenes) for installing.
2) Wait
until a message asking to insert CD2 shows up. Wait... then CD3. Wait ...
3) After completed, it will ask to insert
CD1 again. Do it and finish the installation!
4) Copy content of Crack folder (CD3) and Paste (REPLACE) in Default
folder,
   of installation, generaly - 'C:Program Files (x86)Universal InteractiveThe Hulk'.
5) Enjoy!

Pt-Br

1) Monte a imagem CD1. Execute setup.exe e selecione 1. Instalação mínima ou 2. Instalação
completa (inclui cutscenes) para instalação.
2) Espere até aparecer uma mensagem pedindo para inserir o CD2.
Espere ... então CD3. Esperar ...
3) Depois de concluído, ele pedirá para inserir o CD1 novamente. Faça isso e
termine a instalação!
4) Copie o conteúdo da pasta Crack (CD3) e cole (REPLACE) na pasta de instalação
padrão,
   geralmente - 'C:Aquivos de Programas (x86)Universal InteractiveThe Hulk'.
5) Se desejado,
instale a tradução. Caso a instalação não aconteça automaticamente, será necessário ir até a pasta de
instalação padrão
   e selecionar "The Hulk". Pronto!
6) Aproveite!


Thanks to FLT

Agradecimentos a FLT

DON'T FORGET TO SEED THIS CLASSIC GAME.

NÃO ESQUEÇÃM DE SEMEAR ESTE JOGO CLÁSSICO
